scripts.send-events-v1: cd ./v1discovery-hybrid-indexer; for file in ../events/encoded/*.json; do aws lambda invoke --function-name "DiscoveryHybridIndexer" --endpoint-url "http://127.0.0.1:3001" --payload file://$file out.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out; done
scripts.send-events-v2: cd ./v2discovery-hybrid-indexer; for file in ../events/encoded/*.json; do aws lambda invoke --function-name "DiscoveryHybridIndexer" --endpoint-url "http://127.0.0.1:3001" --payload file://$file out.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out; done
